emuInput.TitMainTitle: Lieut. Gen. Charles E. Hart standing with Col. Paul E. Benson, recipient of Commanders trophy, on lawn of the University of Pittsburgh
emuInput.CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, May 10, 1958, pg. A24 reads: "Receives Trophy - Commander's Trophy for most outstanding National Guard unit of Army Air Defense Commons is presented to Col. Paul E. Benson, commanding officer of the 708th Nike Missile Battalion, in a ceremony on the University of Pittsburgh campus. Congratulating Col. Benson is Lieut. Gen. Charles E. Hart. - Harris Photo."
